name: Brandon Mathis
title: Lead Developer
about:
Hi, I’m Brandon! Born and raised in here in Raleigh-Durham, I started tinkering with computers before I could even spell. I graduated highschool from Millbrook in Raleigh and received my degree in Computer Science from East Carolina University. North Carolina is in my blood and I’m strongly passionate about fostering a strong tech and startup community in the Triangle.

I’ve been developing web applications since 2009 and started working for Smashing Boxes in August of 2014. You can often find me at the Triangle.rb or Stacked meetups that I attend and help organize in my free time. I’m a gamer, foodie, martial-artist, film buff, and technology fanatic. My favorite video game is Metal Gear Solid, my favorite movie is Inception, and my favorite animal is the Octopus.
